about_the_game:
With a focus on psychological horror, 'I REMEMBER' will leave you on edge as you experience the gut-wrenching tension and horrifying story. Expect to see distorted environments, eerie sound design, and MIND, bending puzzles that will test your psychological stability. The game's FOCUS. on implicit horror means that the fear is not solely based on jump scares, but on a deep-seated dread that will STAY WITH you long after you've finished playing.



Step into the shoes of a Father and Son as they navigate the challenges of taking care of one another. Things take a turn for the worse when moving your fathers belonging from his old apartment to your own. Immerse yourself in a first-person experience filled with subtle, implicit terror and elements of survival horror. Traverse through a decaying environment, as you fight and hide from the terror that consumes us all.

As you play, pay close attention to the details within the dialogue and environments, as they will help you piece the story together.

Do you have what it takes to confront the fears that lurk in the shadows and uncover the truth behind 'I REMEMBER'? Find out in this gripping interpretation of an already popular concept.



ME. Laud - the coolest guy of all time.

Huge thanks to Unrested / Inksmith for creating the Art of 'Mother' used in this game. You can check him out on YouTube @Unrested or at @Inksmith or DON'T

Huge thanks to Monk for making awesome music as well as taking my terrible MIDI music and producing it into something useful and awesome.

Huge thanks to MXXN for taking commissions on super short notice and creating awesome music for me to use!

Can't FORGET. DaveFace, the genius behind Unreal Retro Shader.

content_descriptors.notes:
Implicit depictions of Mental Illness
Violence against Strange Entities
Moderate Flashing Lights
Sudden Loud Noises

name: I REMEMBER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590T @ 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have FPS issues, please lower MAX FPS to 30 for consistent experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6600k
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have FPS stability issues, please lower MAX FPS to 30 for consistent experience.

short_description: Step into the shoes of a Father and Son as they navigate the challenges of taking care of one another in 'I REMEMBER', a psychological horror game. Traverse through decaying environments as you hide from terrors that threaten to consume you.
